description: How should you respond when your boss has too many good ideas for data science projects? In this talk, I'll review our use of an adapted version of the Eisenhower Matrix that lays out our projects according to the effort required and the value they will produce. Given the functionally unlimited number of data science projects a team could do, learn how we keep our team focused on valuable work while reducing the stress of a never-ending list of projects.
title: Serenity Now, Productivity Later: Focus Your Project Stack with The Gonzalez Matrix
